astro_pettit1952878778041946551.content: Star trail exposure from the ISS, marked by the thick white path of the Moon, Starlink satellites flashing far right, golden city lights streaking across Earth, and arcing stars.
astro_pettit1952878778041946551.author: astro_pettit

astro_pettit1899546044297335247.content: Star trail from Crew 9 Dragon vehicle. Thanks to Babak Tafreshi for the image processing.
astro_pettit1899546044297335247.author: astro_pettit

astro_pettit1894983570982101319.content: Having an Uber Geek moment on orbit; I took a Teflon knitting needle and got charged water drops to orbit around it.
astro_pettit1894983570982101319.author: astro_pettit

astro_pettit1863996097456169079.content: Star trail from ISS; I think these are a blend of both science and art. There is so much techno-geek stuff to see, or you can simply sit back and think “How cool”.  This one shows atmospheric airglow, yellow-green at 120km and the fainter upper red at 400km, star trails moving in
astro_pettit1863996097456169079.author: astro_pettit

astro_pettit1856772101266416068.content: Gibraltar to Italy. Nothing like learning your geography, not from an atlas but from looking at the real thing.
astro_pettit1856772101266416068.author: astro_pettit
